snippet: The Supreme Court has the opportunity to firmly declare that the First Amendment does not exempt religious entities from accountability for exposing children to harm.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the Roman Catholic Church and other religious groups for arguing that the First Amendment shields them from civil lawsuits for negligent supervision and retention of employees who sexually abuse children; urges the Supreme Court to provide urgently needed clarity on the issue in a case they are set to hear.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court has the opportunity to firmly declare that the First Amendment does not exempt religious entities from accountability for exposing children to harm.
